SendKeyEvent.summary: Send the specified key event to the current HbbTV application (if any)

keyaction.description: Used to distinguish between key up and down

result.description: True if the key event was consumed by the current HbbTV application, otherwise false

params.description: The preferred UI language. A comma-separated set of languages to be used for the user interface of a service, in order of preference. Each language shall be indicated by its ISO 639-2 language code as defined in [ISO639-2].
